title: Beautiful Dead Bella
description: Lana Cloud is hilarious in her carefree attitude to solve the murder of beautiful Bella Reinig. She has a devil-may-care attitude about bringing in any and all means to capture her crook, including stringing along her naive, innocent best friend Clancy to do a great bundle of the dirty work. Nightly escapades through Chicago neighborhoods to nab the killer make this a memorable and fun story.
author: Margaux Sky
